com.b2international.commons.db

Class JdbcUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.commons.db.JdbcUtils

  • public class JdbcUtils
extends Object
    Provides utility methods for issuing database queries and updates using the JDBC API.

    Where not otherwise specified, caught SQLException instances will be wrapped into RuntimeSQLExceptions and then re-thrown.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String JDBC_DRIVER_H2
      The class name of the H2 JDBC driver

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • createConnection

        public static Connection createConnection(String driverClassName,
                                          String url,
                                          String username,
                                          String password)
        Opens and initializes a connection to a database with the specified parameters.

        The method triggers JDBC driver class loading by invoking the given class' parameterless constructor reflectively, then uses DriverManager to return a database connection. A RuntimeException will be thrown in case the driver class is not available, or if its constructor is not accessible or throws an exception upon invocation.

        Parameters:
        driverClassName - the name of the JDBC driver to use
        url - the JDBC database URL, eg. jdbc:h2:mem:test
        username - the database user name for the connection
        password - the connection password
        Returns:
        an initialized Connection instance

      • close

        public static void close(Connection connection)
        Closes a database connection silently; issues a warning for any SQL exception that occurs during closing.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to close (may be null or an already closed connection)

      • close

        public static void close(Statement statement)
        Closes the specified statement silently; issues a warning for any SQL exception that occurs during closing.

        If the given statement has currently a ResultSet open, it will be closed as well.

        Parameters:
        statement - the statement to close (may be null or an already closed statement)

      • close

        public static void close(ResultSet resultSet)
        Closes the given result set silently; issues a warning for any SQL exception that occurs during closing.
        Parameters:
        resultSet - the result set to close (may be null or a result set which is already closed)

      • commit

        public static void commit(Connection connection)
        Commits the current transaction represented by the specified connection instance. If the connection is set to auto-commit mode, this operation does nothing.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection linked to the transaction to commit

      • prepareStatement

        public static PreparedStatement prepareStatement(Connection connection,
                                                 String sql,
                                                 Object... parameters)
        Prepares a (possibly parameterized) SQL statement and populates it with the given parameters, using the JDBC standard mapping of Java objects.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection to use
        sql - the SQL statement text, containing zero or more '?' placeholders
        parameters - the variable number of statement parameters
        Returns:
        an initialized PreparedStatement instance

      • executeUpdate

        public static int executeUpdate(Connection connection,
                                String sql,
                                Object... parameters)
        Initializes and executes the specified statement (typically an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement, or a DDL statement that modifies database structure).
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to use
        sql - the SQL statement text
        parameters - the variable number of statement parameters
        Returns:
        the affected row count

      • executeIntQuery

        public static Integer executeIntQuery(Connection connection,
                                      String sql,
                                      Object... parameters)
        Executes a query that is expected to return a single integer value.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to use
        sql - the SQL statement text
        parameters - the variable number of statement parameters
        Returns:
        the integer value of the first column of the first result set row, or null if an empty result set is returned from the query

      • executeLongQuery

        public static Long executeLongQuery(Connection connection,
                                    String sql,
                                    Object... parameters)
        Executes a query that is expected to return a single long value.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to use
        sql - the SQL statement text
        parameters - the variable number of statement parameters
        Returns:
        the long value of the first column of the first result set row, or null if an empty result set is returned from the query

      • executeStringQuery

        public static String executeStringQuery(Connection connection,
                                        String sql,
                                        Object... parameters)
        Executes a query that is expected to return a single string.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to use
        sql - the SQL statement text
        parameters - the variable number of statement parameters
        Returns:
        the string value of the first column of the first result set row, or null if an empty result set is returned from the query

      • executeBooleanQuery

        public static Boolean executeBooleanQuery(Connection connection,
                                          String sql,
                                          Object... parameters)
        Executes a query that is expected to return a single boolean value.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to use
        sql - the SQL statement text
        parameters - the variable number of statement parameters
        Returns:
        the boolean value of the first column of the first result set row, or null if an empty result set is returned from the query
